params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.disk_size_gb
params.description: Specifies the size of the disk in base-2 GB.

params.name: data.interface
params.description: Specifies the disk interface to use for attaching this disk, which is either SCSI or NVME. The default is SCSI. For performance characteristics of SCSI over NVMe, see Local SSD performance. Check the Interface enum for the list of possible values.
